title: Bear McCreary - Composer - The Rings of Power, God of War: Ragnarök
description:
Chatting with Bear McCreary about his work on The Rings of Power, God of War, and more!  We'll talk about his work creating the themes for the show, connecting to The Lord of the Rings' Third Age, and what's in store for Season 2!

#theringsofpower #bearmccreary #godofwar

title: LOTRO Before the Shadow Expansion - LIVE First Play & Giveaway
description:
We're playing the brand new The Lord of the Rings Online expansion "Before the Shadow" AND giving away two copies of the ULTIMATE EDITION of Before the Shadow during the stream!  Simply join us for the stream and you've got a chance to win!

#lotro #lordoftherings #beforetheshadow
